Title: Honey
Writer: Mauro Covacich (novel), Valeria Golino, Francesca Marciano, Valia Santella
Actors: Jasmine Trinca, Carlo Cecchi, Libero De Rienzo, Vinicio Marchioni
Plot: Irene, nicknamed 'Honey', has devoted herself to people looking for help, and tries to alleviate their suffering, even when they make extreme decisions. One day she has to cope with Grimaldi and his invisible malaise.
